properties.areaDesc: Southern Saratoga; Montgomery; Southern Fulton; Eastern Schenectady
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:29AM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet
accumulations of less than one inch, and ice accumulations of a
light glaze.

* WHERE...Southern Fulton, Montgomery, Eastern Schenectady and
Southern Saratoga Counties in eastern New York.

* WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Untreated ground surfaces will become slippery. Plan
on slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges. Slippery travel
conditions expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy ground conditions could linger a few
hours after temperatures rise above the freezing mark.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
